column2: SELECT dbo.fCosmoDc (#, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT) # as distmin, dbo.fCosmoDc (#, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT) +# as distmax, p.ra AS pra, p.dec AS pdec, p.modelmag_r, pz.z as photoz FROM Galaxy AS G OUTER APPLY dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (#, #, #) AS n OUTER APPLY dbo.fCosmoZfromDc (distmin, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT) as zmin OUTER APPLY dbo.fCosmoZfromDc (distmax, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT) as zmax LEFT JOIN PhotoObj AS p ON n.objid = p.objid LEFT JOIN Photoz as pz ON n.objid = pz.objid WHERE G.objID = n.objID and pothoz< zmax and pothoz< zmix INTO MyDB.NearbyObjEq5
